resources.string: Our commitment towards a better society drives us. The core values inform all of our work. They shape what we do and how we do it. They bind us to a collective vision and purpose.
Love grows by giving. Love is born through the giving of kindness.
Caring people helping others not because they expect reward but because it is an act of kindness.
LOVE CARE SHARE Foundation is a Not-for-Profit Non-Government-Organisation registered under Section 8(Old Section 25B) of the companies act.

LOVE CARE SHARE Foundation aims at engaging socially conscious corporates/institutions, groups and individuals with a purpose to collectively add value to the society at large. We observed that there are corporates and individuals who have a noble purpose of contributing to the welfare of the society, but were not aware as to how to utilize their resources for the betterment of the society.
LOVE CARE SHARE Foundation acts as bridge between the Have’s and the Have Not’s.
LOVE CARE SHARE Foundation provides a platform to collaborate these conscious corporates, groups and individuals for the welfare and development of society.
